snippet: Police Commissioner William J. Bratton and the office of the Manhattan district attorney, Cyrus R. Vance Jr., are devising strategies to drive down crimes like domestic violence and cybercrime.
abstract: New York City Police Commissioner William J Bratton and office of Manhattan district attorney, Cyrus R Vance Jr, begin unusually close collaboration aimed at driving down other crimes, including grand larceny, domestic violence and cybercrime; will devise strategies for targeting offenders believed to be driving crime, using same intelligence-gathering techniques employed to dismantle street gangs.
lead_paragraph: Police Commissioner William J. Bratton and the office of the Manhattan district attorney, Cyrus R. Vance Jr., are devising strategies to drive down crimes like domestic violence and cybercrime.

headline.main: In Unusual Collaboration, Police and Prosecutors Team Up to Reduce Crime
headline.print_headline: In Unusual Collaboration, Police and Prosecutors Team Up to Reduce Crime
